co.cask.cdap.test

Class TestBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cask.cdap.test.ConfigurableTestBase
      • co.cask.cdap.test.TestBase

  • public class TestBase
extends ConfigurableTestBase
    Base class to inherit from for unit-test. It provides testing functionality for Application. To clean App Fabric state, you can use the ConfigurableTestBase.clear() method.

    Custom configurations for CDAP can be set by using ClassRule and TestConfiguration.

    See Also:
    TestConfiguration
